name: Saga Hotel Oslo, BW Premier Collection
description: Within a family orientated setting of design-hotels, Saga Hotels comprises of four contrasting concepts dotted throughout Oslo City Centre. Four underlying characteristics of Saga Hotels can be defined by its promise of high standards, trendy interior, exceptional service and relaxing atmosphere. 'Making home feel closer'. The journey of Saga Hotels first began in Frogner, where Saga Hotel Oslo, BW Premier Collection was established. This beautiful setting, rich in heritage, and surrounded by the quaint architecture of Majorstuen was a prosperous beginning to what would eventually expand the family into three new concepts throughout Oslo. Each individual concept focuses on attracting various types of travelers whilst catering to their everyday needs and desires. Our reception area will be renovated from October 16th until March 1st, 2024. This may result in slightly more noise than usual.bestwestern.com

name: Scandic Victoria
description: Set in the heart of the city, Scandic Victoria offers easy access to Oslo's main retail areas and tourist attractions. It also provides free Wi-Fi, meeting rooms and a 24-hour reception. Rooms at Scandic Victoria are modern and offer a refrigerator, a flat-screen TV and tea and coffee making facilities. There are also honeymoon suites available. During their stay at Scandic Victoria, guests can dine at Victoria Haven and relax with a drink at Victor. A variety of cafés and restaurants are also available in the surrounding area. The hotel is close to Nationaltheatret Tram Station, making it easy for guests to discover Oslo and its surrounding areas. Karl Johans gate, Oslo City Hall and the Nationaltheateret are also all only a quick walk away.Revato

name: Scandic Byporten
description: A 10-minute walk from Bussterminalen Oslo, Scandic Byporten has an accessible setting, making it an ideal base while in Oslo. This modern hotel is set in the heart of the city. This cosy hotel provides free bicycle rental, free Wi-Fi and a 24-hour reception. There is public parking nearby for those with a car. Just moments from nearby clubs and bars, this 3-star hotel also allows guests to easily discover the best of the local nightlife. Rooms at Scandic Byporten are bright and offer blackout curtains and a flat-screen TV. They all have a private bathroom, an in-room safe and a desk. Those staying at Scandic Byporten can sit down to a unique dining experience at the in-house restaurant, ideally located for those who want to stay close by when looking for a bite to eat. Each evening, guests can relax in the cosy lounge bar. The hotel also offers a daily breakfast that can be enjoyed in the dining room, or there is a selection of well-known eateries in the area to discover. Scandic Byporten is conveniently situated for sightseeing in Oslo, with Oslo Spektrum only moments away on foot. Karl Johans gate, Stortinget and the Oslo Opera House are also within a 10-minute walk.Revato

name: Quality Hotel Entry
description: Get more value for your hard-earned money at our smoke-free Quality Hotel Entry in Trollaasen, NO near the Tusenfryd Amusement Park, Edvard Munch museum, Vigeland Sculpture Park and the Roald Amundsens home. Our pet-friendly hotel caters to your needs with amenities like free breakfast, wireless high-speed Internet, meeting space and copy, print and fax services, to name a few. Guest rooms come with refrigerators, TVs, mini bars and more. Get more value at our Quality Hotel Mastemyr. Book now. Children 12 and under stay free if sharing room with parents or grandparents when no additional bedding is required. Pet accommodations are available, contact the hotel for more details. Please note that all Choice Hotels in Scandinavia are non-smoking properties.Choice Hotels

name: Quality Hotel 33
description: The pet-friendly Quality Hotel 33 is located minutes north of the city center and is the best place to begin or end a visit to Oslo. Other nearby attractions include the Oslo Cathedral, Akershus Fortress castle and the Toyen Manor house, featuring the Munch Museum and the Botanical Garden. Enjoy hotel amenities like meeting space, boardrooms, restaurants, free full breakfast buffet, free wireless Internet, a business center, an exercise room, valet dry cleaning, a sauna and plenty more. Guest rooms come with hair dryers, mini bars and TVs. Extra amenities like free weekday newspapers, trouser presses and robes come in some rooms. We look forward to welcoming you soon.Choice Hotels

name: Scandic Olympiatoppen Sportshotel
description: Situated only a short walk from Sognsvann Train Station, Olympiatoppen Sportshotel - Scandic Partner provides guests with an ideal base while visiting Oslo. Guests also have access to complimentary Wi-Fi and on-site parking. There are a variety of amenities at the hotel on offer to guests, such as meeting rooms, a sauna and a fitness centre. Staff are available 24/7 and can help with booking tours and tickets. The rooms at Olympiatoppen Sportshotel - Scandic Partner feature a desk, a seating area and a private bathroom. They provide a radio, heating and a telephone. Those staying at Olympiatoppen Sportshotel - Scandic Partner can sit down to a unique dining experience at the in-house restaurant, conveniently based for those who want to stay close by when looking for a bite to eat. The hotel is close to Kringsja Metro Station, making it easy for guests to travel around Oslo and its surrounding areas. It is also a brief car trip from Telenor Arena, Holmenkollen Ski Jump and Majorstuen.Revato

name: Topcamp Bogstad - Oslo
description: Topcamp Bogstad - Oslo features garden views, free WiFi and free private parking, located in Oslo, 10 km from Sognsvann Lake. There is also a kitchen in some of the units equipped with a dishwasher. The campground offers an outdoor fireplace. Skiing, cycling and hiking are possible within the area, and Topcamp Bogstad - Oslo offers ski-to-door access. Oslo Central Station is 10 km from the accommodation, while Akershus Fortress is 13 km away. The nearest airport is Oslo Airport, 57 km from Topcamp Bogstad - Oslo.

name: Grand Hotel Oslo
description: Only two minutes from Karl Johans gate, Grand Hotel Oslo by Scandic is located in the heart of Oslo. Surrounded by local bars and restaurants, it is a short walk from Oslo Central Station. This 5-star hotel offers body treatments, a ballroom and free Wi-Fi. Corporate amenities include meeting rooms. It also has its very own spa and wellness centre, Artesia Spa. The luxurious feel of each room at Grand Hotel Oslo by Scandic is complemented by facilities like flat-screen TVs and mini bars. They all have a desk, a seating area and a private bathroom. The hotel offers a variety of places to have a meal, including Palmen and Eight. Room service is also available during certain times. The hotel is ideally located for sightseeing in Oslo with Oslo City Hall within walking distance. Guests can also visit Aker Brygge, Royal Palace and Oslo Spektrum.Revato
